4. Putting it All Together

Section Overview

Now that you’ve thought through each aspect of your program, it’s time to put it all together in a final version.

Objectives for This Section

  • Complete a plan for a program that fully leverages connected learning

Learning Aid: Complete Your Programming KWL

Reflecting on this module as a whole, review the KWL you completed at the beginning of the module. Review what you wrote at the beginning of the class, then complete the L(earned) section. What did you learn in this module? Did you learn everything from your W column?
